HSRogue:AbstractWeaponPower.NAME: Weapon
DESCRIPTIONS: Weapon Equipped

HSRogue:StealthPower.NAME: Stealth
DESCRIPTIONS: Attack cannot deal damage if it is less than your Block . NL Gain 2 block (affected by Dexterity) when entering or re-entering stealth; removed at the start of turn.

HSRogue:RenosLuckyHat.NAME: Reno's Lucky Hat
DESCRIPTIONS: Dexterity/Strength up NL Take Unblock attack will drop in your discard pile！

HSRogue:JadeGrowth.NAME: Jade Growth
DESCRIPTIONS: Enhance all Jade card's effect

HSRogue:EvasionPower.NAME: Evasion
DESCRIPTIONS: Secret: At end of your turn NL If you are in Stealth or have no Block NL Gain %d Block NL (Affect by Dexterity )

HSRogue:DirtyTricksPower.NAME: Dirty Tricks
DESCRIPTIONS: Secret:At start of your turn NL Non attack intent monster gain %d Vulnerable and Weak

HSRogue:DoubleCrossPower.NAME: DoubleCross
DESCRIPTIONS: Secret:At start of your turn, If there is only one monster NL draw %d cards

HSRogue:AmbushPower.NAME: Ambush！
DESCRIPTIONS: Secret:At end of monster's turn,attack Non attack intent monster with your weapon

HSRogue:PlagiarizePower.NAME: Plagiarize
DESCRIPTIONS: Secret:at start of turn/using,Add an unique CheatSheet to your hand

HSRogue:DeathsShadowPower.NAME: Valeera The Hollow
DESCRIPTIONS: Permanently Stealth and Stealth now can prevent any kind of damage NL At start of turn/using add an unique Shadow Reflection to your hand

HSRogue:TheCavernsBelowPower.NAME: The Caverns Below
DESCRIPTIONS: Quest :Use 6 identical cards（Non Basic or Colorless card）NL Reward: CrystalCore

HSRogue:BazaarBurglaryPower.NAME: Bazaar Burglary
DESCRIPTIONS: Quest :Use 6 another class's card NL Reward: AncientBlades

HSRogue:AncientBlades.NAME: Ancient Blades
DESCRIPTIONS: Your weapon permanently gains +2/+2 NL Add a unique Mirage Blade to your hand at the start of turn

HSRogue:CrystalCorePower.NAME: Crystal Core
DESCRIPTIONS: Enhance all cards by %d

HSRogue:TessGreymanePower.NAME: Scavenge
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose one: NL 1. Discover an another class's card, Enhance it's effect by 2 NL 2. Next another class's card you played will play twice NL 3. Discover an another class's card you played this combat reduce it's cost by 1. NL Two charge counters, one is regained each turn.

HSRogue:ShadowdancePower.NAME: Shadowdance
DESCRIPTIONS: When played a 0 cost card,Add a 1 cost copy into your hand

HSRogue:WaterdancePower.NAME: Waterdance
DESCRIPTIONS: When played a 1 cost card,Add a 0 cost copy into your hand

HSRogue:SleightOfHandPower.NAME: Sleight Of Hand
DESCRIPTIONS: The next card your play this turn spend 1 [E] less NL Two charge counters, one is regained each turn.

HSRogue:SpiritOfTheSharkPower.NAME: Spirit Of The Shark
DESCRIPTIONS: Your combo effect trigger twice

HSRogue:SilencePower.NAME: Silenced
DESCRIPTIONS: Remove all positive buffs for one turn

HSRogue:PlayTwicePower.NAME: Play Twice
DESCRIPTIONS: Next another class's card you played will play twice

HSRogue:ShadowSecretPower.NAME: Shadow Secret
DESCRIPTIONS: When actively trigger a Secret , other secrets will also be triggered %d times

HSRogue:BamboozlePower.NAME: Bamboozle
DESCRIPTIONS: When you completely block damage from a monster's attack, transfers the damage from the last fully blocked attack to another monster. NL If there are no other monsters, it deals %d damage to the source of the attack.

HSRogue:PerjuryPower.NAME: Perjury
DESCRIPTIONS: At end of turn, trigger %d other secrets

HSRogue:ShadowClonePower.NAME: Shadow Clone
DESCRIPTIONS: Triggers when you play %d of the same card (can only actively trigger once per turn). NL Play the card that has been played the most times in this combat (excluding colorless/basic cards).

HSRogue:StickySituationPower.NAME: Sticky Situation
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the enemy's turn, if they have more than one type of debuff, each debuff deals %d damage and inflicts 2 Poison.

HSRogue:SecretPassageBackupPower.NAME: Secret Passage
DESCRIPTIONS: At start of your turn，Return the removed cards
